name: ElevenLabs
description: ElevenLabs provides advanced AI-powered text-to-speech and voice cloning tools for realistic audio creation.
longDescription: ElevenLabs is an AI-driven platform specializing in text-to-speech and voice cloning, enabling users to create highly realistic and expressive audio in multiple languages. Founded by former Google and Palantir engineers, its mission is to make content universally accessible through cutting-edge voice synthesis technology. The platform serves creators, businesses, and developers by offering tools to generate lifelike voices for audiobooks, videos, podcasts, and more. It supports over 70 languages and allows customization of tone and emotion, addressing challenges in media production and accessibility. With easy-to-use APIs and SDKs, ElevenLabs empowers developers to integrate AI audio into various applications. Its innovative approach has disrupted the media industry, earning praise for seamless inflection and rhythm in generated voices.
features: Text-to-speech generates studio-quality audio from text in over 70 languages with natural intonation.
Voice cloning creates custom AI voices that mimic specific speakers for personalized audio projects.
AI dubbing translates and dubs videos into 29 languages, enhancing global content accessibility.
Voice Library allows users to generate, share, and explore unique voices for diverse use cases.
Inline audio tags enable control over tone, such as [whispers] or [excited], for expressive audio output.
Reader App converts articles, PDFs, or ePubs into high-quality audio for on-the-go listening.
API integration provides developers with tools to embed realistic AI voices into applications.
Audiobook creation supports indie authors with tools to produce and publish professional audio content.

faqs.question: What is ElevenLabs used for?
faqs.answer: ElevenLabs is used to create realistic AI-generated audio for text-to-speech, voice cloning, and dubbing in various applications like audiobooks, videos, and podcasts.

faqs.question: Does ElevenLabs offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, ElevenLabs provides a free plan with 10,000 characters monthly, suitable for individuals to test its AI audio features.

faqs.question: How many languages does ElevenLabs support?
faqs.answer: ElevenLabs supports over 70 languages for text-to-speech and 29 languages for AI dubbing, ensuring broad accessibility.

faqs.question: Can I create a custom voice with ElevenLabs?
faqs.answer: Yes, the voice cloning feature allows users to create custom AI voices, with paid plans supporting up to 10 custom voices.

faqs.question: Is ElevenLabs suitable for developers?
faqs.answer: ElevenLabs offers APIs and SDKs, making it easy for developers to integrate AI audio into their applications.

faqs.question: What is the ElevenLabs Reader App?
faqs.answer: The Reader App converts text from articles, PDFs, or ePubs into high-quality audio for convenient listening on the go.

faqs.question: How does the pricing work for ElevenLabs?
faqs.answer: Pricing starts at $0 for the free plan, with paid tiers like Starter ($5/month) and Creator ($22/month), plus usage-based API plans.

faqs.question: Can ElevenLabs be used for video dubbing?
faqs.answer: Yes, ElevenLabsâ€™ AI dubbing feature translates and dubs videos into 29 languages for platforms like YouTube and TikTok.
